info.title: Participant Self-Service
info.description:
Getting started with the Participant Self-Service product:

This set of services can be implemented to provide access to retirement plan accounts for plan participants. It includes services that enable the ability to inquire and transact on the retirement accounts (such as making purchases and selling of shares).

Many of the APIs in the product require specific settings to be established. Work with your Client Services Team to ensure the settings are correct for your specific use.

Host: uat-apis.ssctech.com

Basepath: /participant-self-service/v1

get.description:
Function:
Retrieve participant address (Primary and Secondary), phone number, Mobile number and Email address.

parameters.name: employeeTaxID
parameters.description:
The tax ID number for the participant.

Max Length: 9

Note:
  • employeeTaxID, participantID, and planID are NOT required. But, either employeeTaxID - OR - participantID and planID are required.

parameters.name: icuID
parameters.description:
Unique ID for the Investment Company Unit (ICU).

Max Length: 5

Format: #####

parameters.name: nameID
parameters.description:
Specify the authorizationContext to be used for security;
  • when userType = OPID, the sponsors operator id must be supplied
  • when userType = PSSN, the participants SSN must be supplied
  • when userType = PPID, the participant user id must be supplied
  • when userType = PTID, the third party administrator(TPA) id must be supplied
  • when userType = PRID, the retirement consultant(RC) id must be supplied
  • when userType = ADID, the advisor id must be supplied
  • when userType = OWID, the customer service representative ID must be supplied

parameters.name: participantID
parameters.description:
Unique ID for a participant registration.

Max Length: 9

Format: #########

Notes:
  • Only one participant registration can be assigned a status of Active.
  • A participant registration is initially established when an employee makes/earns an investment in a Plan.
  • Ownership/allocation can be transferred to a Beneficiary or Qualified Domestic Relations Order (QDRO) in the event of death or divorce as an example.
  • employeeTaxID, participantID, and planID are NOT required. But, either employeeTaxID - OR - participantID and planID are required.

parameters.name: planID
parameters.description:
Unique ID for the Plan.

Max Length: 7

Format: #######

Note:
  • employeeTaxID, participantID, and planID are NOT required. But, either employeeTaxID - OR - participantID and planID are required.

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: Specify the securityChannel; valid options are OPID, PSSN, PPID, PTID, PRID, ADID and OWID.

400.description:
Client Errors
  • icuID - ES00043: An ICU ID is required. Enter an ICU ID that is maximum 5 digits.
  • icuID - ES00044: The ICU ID is invalid. Enter an ICU ID that is maximum 5 digits.
  • employeeTaxID - ES00047: Employee Tax ID must be a 9 digits numeric with leading zeros.
  • planID - CMN00007: Internal Plan ID has to be numeric and can not be more than 7 digits.
  • participantID - CMN00012: Participant ID has to be numeric and can not be more than 9 digits.
  • employeeTaxID - ES00080: The participantID and planID both are required when employeeTaxID is empty.
  • employeeTaxID - ES00081: Employee Tax ID must be a 9 digit number greater than 0 with leading zeros.

get.description:
Function:
Retrieve basic information about a participant's registration within a plan.
get.operationId: Retrieve participant's registration details within a plan

parameters.name: icuID
parameters.description:
Unique ID for the Investment Company Unit (ICU).

Max Length: 5

Format: #####

parameters.name: nameID
parameters.description:
Specify the authorizationContext to be used for security;
  • when userType = OPID, the sponsors operator id must be supplied
  • when userType = PSSN, the participants SSN must be supplied
  • when userType = PPID, the participant user id must be supplied
  • when userType = PIID, the participant's internal ID must be supplied in the format icuID-planID-participantID-
  • when userType = PTID, the third party administrator(TPA) id must be supplied
  • when userType = PRID, the retirement consultant(RC) id must be supplied
  • when userType = ADID, the advisor id must be supplied
  • when userType = OWID, the customer service representative ID must be supplied

parameters.name: participantID
parameters.description:
Unique ID for a participant registration.

Max Length: 9

Format: #########

Notes:
  • Only one participant registration can be assigned a status of Active.
  • A participant registration is initially established when an employee makes/earns an investment in a Plan.
  • Ownership/allocation can be transferred to a Beneficiary or Qualified Domestic Relations Order (QDRO) in the event of death or divorce as an example.

parameters.name: planID
parameters.description:
Unique ID for the Plan.

Max Length: 7

Format: #######

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: Specify the securityChannel; valid options are OPID, PSSN, PPID, PIID, PTID, PRID, ADID and OWID.

400.description:
Client Errors
  • icuID - CMN0004: Internal ICU ID has to be numeric and can not be more than 5 digits.
  • icuID - CMN0005: Internal ICU ID must be greater than 0.
  • icuID - CMN0006: Internal ICU ID is required. Enter an ICU ID that is maximum of 5 digits.
  • planID - CMN0007: Internal Plan ID has to be numeric and can not be more than 7 digits.
  • planID - CMN0008: Internal Plan ID must be greater than 0.
  • planID - CMN0009: Internal Plan ID is required. Enter a Plan ID that is maximum of 7 digits.
  • participantID - CMN0012: Participant ID has to be numeric and can not be more than 9 digits.
  • participantID - CMN0013: Participant ID must be greater than 0.
  • participantID - CMN0014: Participant ID is required. Enter a Participant ID that is maximum of 9 digits.
  • dnis - PT00015: DNIS is required.

Unique ID for the Investment Company Unit (ICU).

Max Length: 5

parameters.name: nameID
parameters.description:
Specify the authorizationContext to be used for security;
  • when userType = OPID, the sponsors operator id must be supplied
  • when userType = PSSN, the participants SSN must be supplied
  • when userType = PPID, the participant user id must be supplied
  • when userType = PTID, the third party administrator(TPA) id must be supplied

parameters.description:
Unique ID for the Plan.

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: Specify the securityChannel; valid options are OPID, PSSN, PPID, PTID, PRID, ADID and OWID.

400.description:
Client Errors
  • planID - PL00015: A Plan ID is required. Enter a Plan ID that is maximum 7 digits.
  • planID - PL00016: The Plan ID is invalid. Enter a Plan ID that is maximum 7 digits.
  • icuID - PL00017: An ICU ID is required. Enter a ICU ID that is maximum 5 digits.
  • icuID - PL00018: The ICU ID is invalid. Enter a ICU ID that is maximum 5 digits.
  • icuID - PL00113: The Contact Type Code must be 'Account Administrator', 'Add Representative', 'Additional Service', 'Affiliate Company', 'Custodian', 'Location', 'Payer Tax Reporting', 'Payroll Service', 'Plan Administrator', 'Primary Representative', 'Representative Group', 'Sponsor Company', 'Third Party Administrator' or 'Trustee'.
  • icuID - PL00114: The Financial Intermediary Service ID must be 'Accounting', 'Actuarial', 'Affiliated Dealer', 'Appraisal', 'Auto Force Out Rollover Service', 'Bank Trust', 'Broker', 'Consultant', 'Contract Administrating/Management', 'Dealer Manager', 'Dealer', 'Defined Benefit', 'Document Processing', 'Earnings Distribution Disbursement', 'Financial Advice', 'Financier', 'Insurance', 'Investment Advisory', 'Investment Lineup Fiduciary Service', 'Investment Management Marketing', 'Investment Management', 'Legal', 'Marketing', 'Plan Administrator', 'Plan Advisory Service', 'Recordkeeper', 'Representative', 'Retirement Consultant', 'Rollover Service', 'Self Directed Brokerage Account Svc', 'Third Party Administrator', 'Trust', 'Voluntary Rollover Service' or '5500 Other Service'.
  • icuID - PL00115: The Financial Intermediary Service ID is required when the Contact Type Code is 'Additional Service'.
  • icuID - PL00116: The Financial Intermediary Service ID must be blank when the Contact Type Code is not 'Additional Service'.

apikey.name: apikey
apikey.description: Client provided secret token required for API calls.

error_description.example: The access token is invalid or has expired

allocatedShareCount.description:

beginningBalance.description:
Beginning balance amount for the requested timeframe.

Max Length: 15 digits with 2 decimal places

Format: ###############.##

contributionsBalance.description:
The total contribution amount for the requested timeframe.

Max Length: 15 digits with 2 decimal places

Format: ###############.##

distributionsAndLoansBalance.description:
The total distribution and loan amounts for the requested timeframe.

Max Length: 15 digits with 2 decimal places

Format: ###############.##

employeeBalance.description:
The total employee contribution amount for the requested timeframe.

Max Length: 15 digits with 2 decimal places

Format: ###############.##

employerBalance.description:
The total employer contribution amount for the requested timeframe.

Max Length: 15 digits with 2 decimal places

Format: ###############.##

endTradeDate.description:
The ending search trade date of a requested date range.

Format: MM/DD/YYYY

endingBalance.description:
Ending balance amount for the requested timeframe.

Max Length: 15 digits with 2 decimal places

Format: ###############.##

feesAndExpensesBalance.description:
The total fee and expense amounts for the requested timeframe.

Max Length: 15 digits with 2 decimal places

Format: ###############.##

gainLossBalance.description:
The total gain and loss amounts for the requested timeframe.

Max Length: 15 digits with 2 decimal places

Format: ###############.##

Notes: This will be calculated as,
gainLossBalance = beginningBalance + contributionsBalance - distributionsAndLoansBalance +/- loansRepaymentsBalance (depends on whether sum is +ve or -ve) +/- otherBalance(depends on whether sum is +ve or -ve) - endingBalance

loansRepaymentsBalance.description:
The total loan repayment amount for the requested timeframe.

Max Length: 15 digits with 2 decimal places

Format: ###############.##

netChange.description:
The difference between the beginningBalance and the endingBalance amounts.

Max Length: 15 digits with 2 decimal places

Format: ###############.##

otherBalance.description:
The total other amount for the requested timeframe.

Max Length: 15 digits with 2 decimal places

Format: ###############.##

startTradeDate.description:
The beginning search trade date of a requested date range.

Identifies the NSCC member number default setup by the client to be propagated to any new trustee entered after the default is set for the investment company.

Max Length: 4

investmentPlanAdditionalFinancialService.description:
Financial service effective date.

Format: YYYY-MM-DD

Financial service expiration date.

Format: YYYY-MM-DD

jointMarketingRepresentativeCode.description:
Indicates the representative is part of a joint marketing agreement with other representatives.

Notes: A joint marketing agreement is an agreement between multiple representatives that split the commissions in predetermined percentages.

Valid Values:
  • Yes
  • No

nsccFirmNumber.description:
Ineditier assigned by the NSCC.

Note:
  • Needed when any of the administrator's plans that have an external mutual fund vehicle that use the NSCC for transaction processing.
  • In this role, the administrator is acting as the third party administrator for those transactions.

planFinancialServiceMasterRepresentative.description:
Identifies the service provider for the master representative assigned to the plan using a financial intermediary service.

Max Length: 20

Name of the master representative associated to a plan for a financial intermediary service.

Max Length: 50

planSponsorElectronicDistributionElectio.description:
Identifies if the plan elects to send email notifications to the plan sponsor for eDistribution requests.

Valid Values:
  • Yes
  • No

Fax number for the primary contact.

Format: ###############

primaryContactFaxTypeCode.description:

  • Domestic

  • Domestic

Max Length: 3

repServiceGroupCommissionSplitRate.description:
Rate used to split commissions for the representative in this service group role.

Format: #####.##########

replyToInternetAddressText.description:
Text that represents the internet address URL or email for the contact identified as "reply to".

Max Length: 255

representativeExternalID.description:
Assigned by the investment company to identify their financial institution fund group representatives.

Max Length: 5

representativeExternalReferenceID1.description:
Assigned by the investment company for its internal use in combination with the representativeExternalReferenceID2.

Max Length: 10

representativeExternalReferenceID2.description:
Assigned by the investment company for its internal use in combination with the representativeExternalReferenceID1.

Max Length: 10

representativeGICCommissionRate.description:
Indicates the commission rate the representative receives on investment vehicles that are Guaranteed Investment Contract (GIC).

Notes:
  • Rate will be 100% if there is only one representative representing the plan in GICs.
  • Multiple representatives in a joint marketing agreement can have a combined total of not more than 100% for a given plan.


Format: #####.##########

representativeGroupElectronicEnrollmentC.description:
Identifies the representative group that is used for electronic enrollment.

Valid Values:
  • Yes
  • No

representativeInsuranceCommissionRate.description:
Indicates the commission rate the representative receives on investment vehicles that are insurance.

Notes:
  • Rate will be 100% if there is only one representative representing the plan in insurance.
  • Multiple representatives in a joint marketing agreement can have a combined total of not more than 100% for a given plan.


Format: #####.##########

representativeMutualFundCommissionRate.description:
Commission rate the representative receives on vehicles that are internal DST mutual funds.

Notes:
  • Rate will be 100% if there is only one representative representing the plan in DST mutual funds.
  • Multiple representatives in a joint marketing agreement can have a combined total of not more than 100% for a given plan.


Format: #####.##########

representativeName.description:
Full name of the fund group representative.

Max Length: 35

Notes:
  • Name is formatted as specified at the financial institution indicated as primary to this representative.
  • Field may contain the value "AUTO ADD", the value signified the transaction was received with a representative name that did not pass the format edit. This is an exception and the name format exception reported. It is possible the value may never change as there are situations where the Broker/Dealer may want to keep the true name of the Representative hidden from FID.

representativeOtherCommissionRate.description:
Indicates the commission rate the representative receives on investment vehicles that are not otherwise explicitly defined.

Notes:
  • Rate will be 100% if there is only one representative representing the plan in the particular vehicle.
  • Multiple representatives in a joint marketing agreement can have a combined total of not more than 100% for a given plan.


Format: #####.##########

representativeOverrideAllowedCode.description:
Identifies if that participant can override the plan's primary representative.

Valid Values:
  • No Override
  • Participant Override

representativePlanEffectiveStartDate.description:

requireSignatures.description:

  • No
